mapper.insert: insert into job_tasks( job_name, source_consume_adt, source_convert_adt, source_data_type, source_data_source, target_load_adt, target_data_type, target_data_source, creater, create_time, state, iscancel, remark ) values ( #{jobName}, #{sourceConsumeAdt}, #{sourceConvertAdt}, #{sourceDataType}, #{sourceDataSource}, #{targetLoadAdt}, #{targetDataType}, #{targetDataSource}, #{creater}, #{createTime}, #{state}, #{iscancel}, #{remark} )
mapper.update: update job_tasks set job_name = #{jobTasks.jobName}, source_consume_adt = #{jobTasks.sourceConsumeAdt}, source_convert_adt = #{jobTasks.sourceConvertAdt}, source_data_type = #{jobTasks.sourceDataType}, source_data_source = #{jobTasks.sourceDataSource}, target_load_adt = #{jobTasks.targetLoadAdt}, target_data_type = #{jobTasks.targetDataType}, target_data_source = #{jobTasks.targetDataSource}, creater = #{jobTasks.creater}, create_time = #{jobTasks.createTime}, state = #{jobTasks.state}, iscancel = #{jobTasks.iscancel}, remark = #{jobTasks.remark} where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select id, job_name AS jobName, source_consume_adt AS sourceConsumeAdt, source_convert_adt AS sourceConvertAdt, source_data_type AS sourceDataType, source_data_source AS sourceDataSource, target_load_adt AS targetLoadAdt, target_data_type AS targetDataType, target_data_source AS targetDataSource, creater, create_time AS createTime, state, iscancel, remark from job_tasks where id = #{id}

select id, job_name AS jobName, source_consume_adt AS sourceConsumeAdt, source_convert_adt AS sourceConvertAdt, source_data_type AS sourceDataType, source_data_source AS sourceDataSource, target_load_adt AS targetLoadAdt, target_data_type AS targetDataType, target_data_source AS targetDataSource, creater, create_time AS createTime, state, iscancel, remark from job_tasks where 1=1 limit #{page.offset},#{page.pageSize}
mapper.insert:
insert into job_tasks
job_name,
source_consume_adt,
source_convert_adt,
source_data_type,
source_data_source,
target_load_adt,
target_data_type,
target_data_source,
creater,
create_time,
state,
iscancel,
remark,
#{jobName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{sourceConsumeAdt,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{sourceConvertAdt,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{sourceDataType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{sourceDataSource,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{targetLoadAdt,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{targetDataType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{targetDataSource,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{creater,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{state,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{iscancel,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mapper.update:
update job_tasks
job_name = #{jobTasks.jobName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
source_consume_adt = #{jobTasks.sourceConsumeAdt,jdbcType=INTEGER},
source_convert_adt = #{jobTasks.sourceConvertAdt,jdbcType=INTEGER},
source_data_type = #{jobTasks.sourceDataType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
source_data_source = #{jobTasks.sourceDataSource,jdbcType=BIGINT},
target_load_adt = #{jobTasks.targetLoadAdt,jdbcType=INTEGER},
target_data_type = #{jobTasks.targetDataType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
target_data_source = #{jobTasks.targetDataSource,jdbcType=BIGINT},
creater = #{jobTasks.creater,jdbcType=BIGINT},
create_time = #{jobTasks.createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
state = #{jobTasks.state,jdbcType=INTEGER},
iscancel = #{jobTasks.iscancel,jdbcType=INTEGER},
remark = #{jobTasks.remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
